name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000001
text: I would rather have someone else do it if it's something that absolutely needs doing.{nl}Why does it always have to be me?

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000002
text: The demons and monsters are still at large...{nl}At least we don't have to worry about being robbed by highwaymen.{nl}That is if we can make it out alive.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000003
text: You go out scouting for days then you have to write up a report for days more!{nl}Can we get anything done in this state?

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000004
text: I'm here to assist Tadas.{nl}I'm not here to clean up after Wolke's mess.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000005
text: I've tricked Kartas and prevented him from stealing the Seed of the Divine Tree.{nl}If I could break away from these seals, I would be able to recover on my own.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000006
text: Why would Kartas go so far as to imprison me under this barrier...{nl}Does he really know the properties of this seed...?

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000007
text: I'm going to find Miss Neringa as soon as I feel a little better.{nl}I'm sure she will know a way for us to rescue Master Medeina from Kartas.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000008
text: Revelator! There's an evil barrier surrounding the forest, it's dangerous in here!{nl}Please, you have to go!

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000009
text: We're trapped inside Kartas' barrier, and Master Medeina's powers aren't enough to break it.{nl}We need to help her regain her strength...

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000010
text: If Kartas finds us, we'll be in great danger.{nl}Please, help Master Medeina recover.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000011
text: I'm glad Ilona is safe at least, despite the barrier.{nl}Revelator, please look for a way to deactivate the barrier.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000012
text: Take Ilona and find Master Medeina.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000013
text: Her footprints stop here. Should we look inside the courtyard?

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000014
text: Oh, I'm so glad Master Medeina is safe!{nl}That Teleportation Magic Circle needs to be destroyed...

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000015
text: Revelator, please destroy the magic circle.{nl}This might be the only chance we get while Kartas is gone.

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000016
text: Master Medeina's barrier is finally gone.{nl}We should hurry now...

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000017
text: Overloading the second magic circle worked!

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000018
text: Oh... Master Medeina...

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000019
text: She...

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000020
text: I was too late...

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20190419_000021
text: Although Master Medeina was taken by Kartas...{nl}Your precious help will always be remembered, Revelator.{nl}

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20200129_000022
text: Defeat the Nuka Warrior, Nuo Assassin

name: QUEST_LV_0500_20200129_000023
text: On the request of Receptionist Ramda of the Mercenary Post{nl}defeat the Nuka Warrior and Nuo Assassin in Tvirtumas Fortress.
